name: August Woods
description:
A cozy simple game who player is allow to manage a cafe called AugustWoods during the autumn season. 

I have spent more efforts on making the assets on my own, and also first time learning to make a music for it, but having less effort on the gameplay.

Hope you enjoy the game.

Submission for the Cozy-autumn-game-jam-2022, Hosted by Firith Studio

Game made with Godot engine, pixel assets made with Aseprite, background music made with Soundtrap.

By: EggStill-Bro

You may follow my twitter: EggStill Bro
